name: Endless Days (Nellaren)
description:
WASD/Arrow keys - to move

Space bar/left click - to interact and advance dialog

A choose your own adventure jam game. A proof of concept. We didn't get as far as we would have liked, but isn't that how jams always go, hehe. We're pretty happy with the progress we made and it shows the core concepts of what we were trying to do.

Coding, minor art, sound - Penelope Schreiner

Story, art lead - Chloe Bradbury
